reports.name: Usage Records Report per Date, Product, Marketplace and Environment

parameters.name: Report period
parameters.description: Provide the usage records creation date period for the report

parameters.name: Usage Record Status
parameters.description: Optionally select the Usage Record Status you want to include in the report
